Summary Note:
The RM met Gruber Fuchs Koller during a business conference in Vienna. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
With a career spanning nearly 22 years, Gruber Fuchs Koller has established himself as a key player in the industry.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Gruber Fuchs Koller and Tanja tied the knot in 2014. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1996, Gruber graduated from BRG/BORG Marchfeldstra√üe with a secondary school diploma.
Gruber completed his university studies at Vienna University of Economics and Business in 2001.
Occupation History:
Gruber Fuchs Koller is a 46 year old Landlord from Austria. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Gruber Fuchs Koller's first role was as a Property Manager at Conwert Immobilien Invest AG, where he worked diligently from 2003 to 2008 to establish a strong reputation.
In 2008, he moved to Immofinanz AG to work as a Developer, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
In 2011, he joined Immofinanz AG as a Construction Company Owner, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped him grow both personally and professionally.
His next role was as a Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT) CEO at CA Immo, where he applied his extensive experience to drive innovation from 2015 to 2016.
His current role as a Landlord at Conwert Immobilien Invest AG, which he has held since 2018, reflects his enduring passion for the field and his unwavering dedication to making a lasting impact.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 340000 EUR.
He has townhouse located in Spittal an der Drau, worth 870000 EUR.

He inherited a significant sum of 360000 EUR from his father, a respected Private Equity Manager, in 2006, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
